title: Claimant average weekly work hours
workHourLabel: Average weekly work hours provided on ET1
p1: It may help the tribunal if you can provide these detail. You will not be penalised for not providing it.
label: Are the claimant’s average weekly work hours correct?
noLabel: What are the claimant’s correct average weekly work hours? (optional)
noLabelHint: Enter the claimant’s average hours worked each week in digits.
